name: Mystery
description: Mystery genre involves the solving of a crime or puzzle, typically by a detective figure. It often features suspense, twists, and unexpected revelations.

name: Romance
description: Romance genre focuses on love and romantic relationships as central themes. It typically includes emotional depth, passion, and the journey of characters finding love.

name: Science Fiction
description: Science fiction genre explores futuristic or speculative concepts, often involving advanced technology, space exploration, and alternative realities.

name: Fantasy
description: Fantasy genre features imaginative worlds, magical elements, mythical creatures, and epic adventures. It often explores themes of heroism, destiny, and good versus evil.

name: Historical Fiction
description: Historical fiction genre is set in the past and incorporates real historical events, settings, and figures into fictional narratives. It offers insights into different time periods and cultures.

name: Thriller
description: Thriller genre focuses on suspense, tension, and excitement. It often involves high stakes, danger, and fast-paced action, keeping readers on the edge of their seats.

name: Horror
description: Horror genre aims to evoke fear, terror, and unease in readers. It often includes supernatural elements, monsters, and psychological horror, exploring the darker aspects of human nature.

name: Biography
description: Biography genre tells the life story of a real person, written by another person. It offers insights into the experiences, achievements, and challenges faced by notable individuals.

name: Self-help
description: Self-help genre provides guidance, advice, and strategies for personal growth, improvement, and self-awareness. It covers various topics such as success, relationships, and mental well-being.

name: Travel
description: Travel genre focuses on exploration, adventure, and discovery of different places and cultures. It often includes personal narratives, travelogues, and insights into unique destinations.
